title: Ants, Ants, and More Ants
description: Ants, Ants, and More Ants is an informational book about one of the most well known of all insects--the ant. Readers will learn about different colors and sizes of ants as well as different jobs ants have within the colony. Photographs support the text.
reviewWords: antennae, ground, insects, jaws, nests, queen, size, yard
grammar: Adjectives                : Recognize adjectives as words that describe
